title: Need help getting in contact with a rioter from Support
body:
So i made a ticket to Re-enable my PBE account, got a response in my email. (providing gyazo links)

[Riot LunaFox answered my ticket](https://gyazo.com/5ca16df1d60dae3b588fff7a74b1f205) 

So when i tried to open the ticket to provide the required information , I get this.

[like the ticket does not exist](https://gyazo.com/b1d08ff3414940a12b180dab0293d09f)

So anyone who can get in contact with her/him please help me out. Thank you in advance :)

replies.body: Like Chermorg mentioned, you should be able to just reply to the email notification you had about that ticket. Otherwise, feel free to just submit a new [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can pick up where they left off!
Just reply to the email - that’ll submit a reply to the ticket. You won’t be able to access that ticket online due to the security reason behind the request.
